channel.title: ggplot2 on Reason Foundation | Data Visualization Guide
channel.description: Recent content in ggplot2 on Reason Foundation | Data Visualization Guide

item.title: Bar plot
item.description: Basic bar plot # Load ggplot2 library(ggplot2) # Create data data <- iris # Barplot ggplot(data, aes(x = Species, y = Petal.Length)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity")
